text: Thank you to @NYSComptroller Tom DiNapoli for hosting this week's episode of #RepresentNYC with @NYSenBenjamin and Assemblymember @LindaBRosenthal to discuss the #COVID19 #vaccine and the state #budget. Watch Sunday at 7pm on MNN (Spectrum 34, 1993, 1995, RCN 82, FiOS 33). https://t.co/jLTXtXwgtS
